name: clhx33
text: It would have been nice to let me use the restroom with it being an emergency. They’re was no reason to not be courteous and share a restroom you’re not using when it’s an appropriate circumstance. Next time have a bit of empathy!

name: Sybil Lee
text: What I want is not sold in this town, so he orders it for me; every week. Love that. Especially love I don't have to drive to Montgomery for it! :D

name: Tonya Stinson
text: Very friendly, helpful, & courteous staff. Store is very clean & neat. All my shopping is done here.

name: Ben Norman
text: Wonderful service and selection.

name: john marlow
text: Great deals and great personalities.

name: D. Jackson
text: quality service and products

name: PATRICK DAVIDSON
text: NICE PEOPLE AND NICE PRICES!!!!!

name: Michael Blackmon
text: Great selection

name: Joe Blocker
text: Great beers and a laid back, cozy vibe. Helpful staff that share plentiful samples!

name: Andrew Fandre
text:
Downtown Huntsville brewery has a jazz jam on Wednesdays. The jazz was highly entertaining and the beer was good. Great midweek entertainment that is just right for a school night.

They have a new loft area that is fun and filled with comfortable seating, darts and games. I enjoyed the espresso porter and the walnut porter. Parking is limited so come early.

resp.text: Thank you Andrew, this is a whole new area - we are trying to create zones. 'The Cave'; 'The Loft'; 'The Zone'; 'The Stage'... Depending on your mood. All areas have been recently repurposed for COVID. We are open and ready to provide a safe environment in these times.

name: Tina Padilla
text: A hidden gem....str82 ale and yellow hammer r great...but this place  ..away from the crowd is AWESOME...1st time here and I WILL Bback

name: Jay Brooks
text:
Really good, weird beers.  The guys here aren't afraid to take chances, and they somehow succeed every time! The building is a converted car repair shop that somehow comes off as cozy, the backyard feels like home, and there's often live music.

Oh.  And beer floats!

name: Alex K
text:
The lady behind the bar was super sweet to obvious first timers. The beers were all amazing, and so full of the flavors promised in the name. I've been to so many big name breweries that offer fruitier beers that fall way short on flavor. Even the blood orange IPA had such a strong fruitiness that it was amazing. I'm not even an IPA fan, but this was great. The bitterness of the hops were well matched by the sweet from the oranges. They also use interesting flavors like kudzu!! Who would have thought?!?
Small little tap room, but a cute little back yard space. I definitely recommend this place

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review!  We are always doing something new so check back often!

name: scotty royal
text: If your on the brewery tour don't leave Mad Malts out. One of the best small breweries in Huntsville, great beer and great staff

name: Blue Tile
text: Went this past weekend. Neat place down a side road. Beer was good and the layout was super cool, like a brewery in a garage.

name: Terry Maxwell
text: Super cool hangout spot.

name: marc eberhardt
text: Very friendly and helpful staff!!  Great variety of tasty beers!

name: Todd Lowry
text: Great first experience.  Cool laid back vibe with good beer.

resp.text: Thank you, Todd. Please visit again soon. We have added 3 new beers since your visit - more to try! Also stop by for the live outdoor concerts and food trucks on Fridays and Saturdays. Check our website calendar for bookings.

name: Ben Payment
text: Great hole in the wall brewey with nice cat bird loft seating and a big backyard.

resp.text: Thank you Ben. Look forward to seeing you again soon! We are open and have many socially responsible seating options in and outside. And the Bands are booking fast for Friday and Saturday backyard concerts.

name: Lulz Chicken
text: Great chill spot for a comfy drink

name: jeremy webster
text: Nice atmosphere and even better beer, had a great time and got a little beer knowledge from the Brew master. Highly recommend going here.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Jeremy.  Hope to see you again real soon!

name: Eric Tran
text: Becky is the best bartender. Great beer and great people. Would recommend.

resp.text: Becky is awesome, she has been here since the beginning and can steer you right better than anyone !!

name: Raymond Shaver
text: Awesome people and great beers!

name: J C
text: Good beers.

name: Jonathan Bowman
text: Best brewery around, Be sure to ask for house favorite Lager

name: Brady Doepke
text: Great place for live music at night, super casual place to hang-out during the day. Very welcoming. If you ever need something just ask the staff they are great. Get the Raspberry Blonde!!! One of the best beers in town if not the best.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review Brandy!  Hope to see you again soon!

name: Jaime E.
text: #1 surprise best

name: Amy Hamilton
text: Every beer I tried was fantastic and the service was equally amazing.  The live music was an extra bonus. Definitely a must-try spot in Huntsville.

resp.text: Thank you Amy!  It's always good to here feedback good or bad (ok, we really like the good better ;-)

name: Ken Barnes
text: Good beer. Excellent owners; just some folks sitting around, brewing beer in a small warehouse, having fun and being friendly. Occasional live music. Not much in the way of food but food trucks do park outside on busy nights.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Ken.  We try to have food whenever the expected crowd will support it.  Hopefully that will be more and more often going forward!

name: Amy Wright
text: Cute place, Becky is the sweetest soul! I like how you can choose your own beers for a flight. Live entertainment was excellent.

resp.text: Thanks for the comment and review Amy!

name: 8bit Hitman
text: It's an open brewing environment, so you get to see the magic happen while you enjoy the suds. I tried samples of everything on tap and was very impressed. The winner for me was the amber with the IPA a close second. The staff were friendly and make you feel welcome and right at home. This place is a Must-Visit on your next brew tour!

name: Matthew Connell
text: Small, local brewery that makes some excellent craft beer. With some excellent porters and stouts, they're more focused on the maltier end of the spectrum than a lot of other current breweries. The tap house and brewery are the same space and facility with no bells and whistles but always great beer and good company.

name: CC
text: First time there today. Brews were good. We will be back!

resp.text: Thank you for the good review Colleen!

name: Max
text: Fantastic atmosphere and music. Great beer too! Try the Walnut Porter! 👍

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Max!  We have had a lot of positive feedback on the Walnut Porter.

name: Candy Lusk Davis
text: We love Mad Malts, great place, awesome people and really good beer! What more could you want? 😊

resp.text: Thank you Candy!  I know I couldn't ask for any more! ;-)

name: Michelle Patterson
text: Attended an event there for A New Leash, first time there. Really enjoyed it! Great vibe, great outdoor area! Will be back!

resp.text: Thank you Michelle.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Bruce Woody
text: Awesome! Opened early for st. Patty's day. We had a blast!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Bruce!

name: Nathan Rigby
text: Overcrowded (I might have gone at a bad time?), with kids jumping everwhere without adult supervision. Light are hanging from the ceiling by rope. Bartender was frustrated with the crowd. My first beer was horrible. The bartender was nice enough to get me another drink which was substantially better. Live music was good and prices were reasonable.

resp.text:
Hi Nathan.  Please accept our apologies for your poor experience.  We did find out who's children were poorly supervised and we will make sure that doesn't happen again.  We are family friendly and want everyone to have a good time, but at the same poor behavior will not be tolerated.  If this ever happens again please notify one of the staff.  Thanks for the feedback.

There was a lot going on Wednesday, with the runners, jazz jam and Channel 48 viewing party.  We always try to have enough help on busy nights like that, but we did under predict the crowd a bit that night, which may have lead to the bartender's frustration.  We will speak with the staff and make sure everyone understands to vent to management and not customers when things go wrong.

I am curious about which beer you had that was bad.  Was it the Blood Orange IIPA?  We were having trouble with that one when we tapped a new keg, but as I recall we were able to get it to clear with a little effort.

Again, please accept our apologies.  Know that we are working to address your concerns, and I would encourage you to give us a second chance.  I believe your second experience will be much better.

name: vidalia jewel
text: Awesome place. Great owners. Awesome selection of beers.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Amy Landreneau
text: Melanie always takes excellent care of us as clientele and the music is always phenomenal. Great place to hang your hat any night of the week in a very relaxed laid-back environment.

name: StrikerJ
text: This place turned me into a beer person! Chill atmosphere and great unique drinks.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the generous review!  Having customers appreciate your efforts is the most rewarding aspect of this business.  Come see us again!

name: John Carradine Baker
text: My fav local brwery !  funky atmosphere - great outdoor area with a firepit ! ohhh and the brews are AWESOME  - - - owner & staff are also wonderful :)

resp.text: Thanks John!

name: Guy Incognito
text: A small, inviting taproom with tables that are right next to the tanks.  Their beers are very drinkable; their hefeweizen is THE BEST IN HUNTSVILLE.

name: Cindy Hill
text: First time to visit. It was an enjoyable evening and I will definitely make a return visit.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Cindy!  BTW, your not related to Larry Hill are you?

name: Blaine McKeever
text: Very cool.  A place built by hand.  Good beer.

name: Keith Bloemer
text: Great beer, friendly staff, and a good place to get together and have a good time.  They also have live music several times a week.

name: Nghia Huynh
text: The Raspberry Blonde is out of this world.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the awesome rating!  We love getting feedback from our customers, both positive and negative, but the positive ones are definitely my favorites!  ;-)

name: Caleab Farley
text: A wonderful tap room with a great selection! If you are a beer lover you have to try this local beer!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Caleab!

name: Tony Utterback
text: If you want true craft beer brewed with remarkable flavor and excellent quality, this is definitely the place to go.

name: Beth Ignatiuk
text: Some of the best craft beers in Huntsville. Small environment but great atmosphere.

name: Jessica Ramsay
text: Excellent service, smooth brews, and a relaxed atmosphere. This is probably my most visited local brewery

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback Jessica!  We like things smooth are relaxed!  Kudos to Becky, John and Christina.

name: Jonathan Glennon
text: Great beer, often they have live music.

resp.text: Thanks for the good review Jonathan.

name: RockStar Wifee
text: Nice place to relax with friends, great beer and music! The owners are so friendly!!

name: Ray Simmons
text: These guys rock the malts, for a good time give them a try.

name: Gary Smith
text: Great place to meet a group of friends.

resp.text: Thanks for the great reviews Gary!  Hope to see you again soon!

name: Brent Cagle
text: Cool place to hang out at and drink a few brews

name: F L
text: Great visit, friendly atmosphere!!  Beast mode and Ft. Pound force rocked it!

name: Martin Davis
text: Great beer, very friendly staff!

resp.text: Thanks Martin!  Come back and see us!

name: Vanessa Cole
text: Great small brewery!

resp.text: And we are always improving!  Thanks for the great review Vanessa!

name: Christine Nguyen

resp.text: Thanks you Christine!

name: Austin Decker
text: Fun place, great beer!

name: Kristen Esteve

resp.text: Thank you Kristen!  Spring and summer seasonal should be coming out soon, check back often.

name: Vernon Page

resp.text: I agree!  Thanks Vernon!

name: Steven Scone
text: Cool garage grung feel!!

resp.text: Thanks Steven!  We classify our decor as "Late American Scrounger"!  ;-)

name: Akram Kiassi
text: Cute little place.

resp.text: Thanks Akram.  We are always striving to improve, and positive responses helps keep us motivated!  Cheers!

name: Mike Wilkinson
text: Best picnic table in town.

name: matthew basaraba
text: Very nice beer and great atmosphere to sit and have a couple ice cold beers with friends and family. Highly recommend the New England IPA and American Wheat!

name: B Jane Denzer
text: Visiting relative who took me to most of the local establishments. Had Main Channel amber at another restaurant. Came to the source for their Kolsch. Fantastic! Came back on a Saturday when Homecoming Cafe Sideshow foodtruck was there. Fantastic food with another Kolsch! Loved the atmosphere and service, too.

name: Jeremy Brown
text: Nice little brewery. They need a outside area for cornhole, darts or other beer games. The beer was pretty good. The live music was pretty good to.

name: Messy Potamia
text: To get beer this good (and good company like this too) you'd have to go to Belgium. Trust me I know 😍

name: Frances McCoy
text: This place is a hidden gem! The staff was incredibly helpful and friendly, recommending places for dinner and scenic views (we're not from the area) but it's really all about the beer. Their IPAs are excellent and the Beermosa is a great option for companions that might not be as in to the hops. :-)

name: Lori Reitzig
text: Great local brewery with a wide range of beer styles. Knowledgeable, and friendly staff. I recommend the Juicy Double IPA, and the hubby recommends the Oktoberfest. Outdoor patio for those that smoke (like my husband) and a food truck just pulled in!

name: Bryan Benefield
text: Great atmosphere and great beer, can't wait to get back

name: trace kornegay
text: Good beer, relaxed atmosphere

name: Jared Boike
text: The amber ale is fantastic, so is the strawberry chocolate beer. The guy at the bar was really cool, and then someone came out from the back and was acting really mad/was acting like he wanted us to leave. Not sure what that was about...

resp.text: I’m sorry if you got that impression. We do have temporary hours during the pandemic until 8pm but no one was telling anyone to leave as we had people that would be there after our temporary posted hours. I believe the person from the back even served one of the party members that came in after hours so I’m not really sure what the confusion is about. Please don’t let that deter you from coming back and we are glad you enjoyed the beer!

name: George Hodges
text: Great beer.  Friendly staff.  Relaxing atmosphere.  Main Channel Amber is my Go-to beer, but their other products are well worth trying.  I enjoy sampling the new options when available.

name: Corey Hill
text: Great staff

name: bev bauer
text: Very warm friendly place with a great view history and beer.

name: Jeremy Banks
text: Cool place for a Saturday afternoon drink. Friendly people and good beer. Food trucks and events available on occasion.

name: Ahmed Arafat
text: Great location. For the amount of time it’s open a week, good selection. Has VERY VERY great potential to be a top place in Gville. Excited to see if this place grows!

name: barry kennedy
text: Great gathering place.  Live music, food trucks, and great beer.

name: Shannon B.
text: Loved the beer & the time spent enjoying it!! We'll definitely be back!

name: David Pearce
text: Great place to go on a Saturday afternoon. Great atmosphere. Great service.

name: Jeff Richards
text: Dunkel wiess is a rare find and Excellent!!

name: Aaron Bearden
text: Great place with even greater people.

name: Mitchell Fountaine
text: Good brews and good service in a cozy setting

name: sean williams

text: Love the Irish Red.  Good people

name: Don Ebert
text: It's a tap room.  Great IPA!  Cordial hospitality.  Try it!

name: Amanda Gregory
text: Great brew! Great people! Cheers🍻

name: Troy Bell
text: Great place to sample really good craft 🍺.

name: John Breyfogle
text: Pleasant atmosphere, helpful bartenders who want to help you have a good experience.

name: Alan H
text: When your website states your open then a customer drives for over an hour to try your place just to be told you are closed due to a private party   What a waste of time, suggest if you are closed wouldn't it be a good idea to update your website for such a thing as being closed for a private party

name: B Price
text: Awesome local brewery with a great atmosphere.

name: Mark Green
text: Great selection and great staff, fun atmosphere!

name: Darlene Mosley
text: Great relaxed atmosphere, and great beer!

name: Michael Bowman
text: Good brews good people.

name: Lance M
text: I love this place

name: Jnifr Hill
text: Great, informative service.

name: Doug Pike
text: Great beer!

name: Curtis Roesner
text: Good people, good brews.

name: Scott Michael
text: Nice local brewery

name: Tim Wynn
text: Gre at beer and service

name: Jermaine Hampton
text: Great beer and atmosphere

name: Kara Popovich
text: friendly, good beer

name: Alex Mclemore
text: Great drinks!! Wonderful atmosphere!!!

name: Chris Ellis
text: Great beer awesome people!

name: Matt Riales
text: Honestly very good! They gave my wife a Mother's Day glass the second we got to the table. She loves it! My only complaint is my burger and I believe that was my fault with the way I ordered it, so I did not say anything. Not their fault. The draft beer that was suggested by our server was amazing! We will definitely be back for more, with a little more experience!

name: KIA HUNTER
text: My order was completely thrown together. I specified in my online order, condiments on the side, for my burger, and I asked for sautéed onions. My burger came with neither on it, or on the side. My burger was lukewarm almost cold and dry. My fries were soggy and lukewarm. I placed my order in the parking lot of the restaurant, at 8:32 p.m. I checked into curbside pickup around 8:45 after I received the text message from the restaurant saying that I could check in. There was no reason for my food to be lukewarm almost cold. I am highly dissatisfied and disappointed in the service I received. The staff for that shift literally just threw together an order. I have never received service like this from you all before.

name: Carly Stuart
text: The food truly was great! And everyone seemed to check on us while we were eating. Our waitress, the manager and even the chef came out to see how everything was. Very friendly staff. The only complaint I have is my chili came out and wasn't very hot, but it was still delicious and I ate all of it because it was that good! My boyfriends food came out and wasn't that hot either, but my pizza came out fresh! Overall, it was still a great experience and the food all tasted amazing.

name: Jamila Shabazz
text:
The customer service was good. Very busy in there. Our waiter was very busy. They forgot to bring our food to us. It took them less than 15 mins to give us our beverages. Food was salty. I had cheese broccoli (salty) Mediterranean taco (salty)
Our entrees came out cold. House salad with ranch was salty. When a person that wasn’t our waiter brought us the salad, he didn’t think to give us a utensils. We didn’t have utensils when we got to the table. My family personally will not be going back pass 8pm; we might give them another chance around lunch time. The atmosphere was pleasant, that’s what we enjoyed the most. It look like they were under staff. Our waiter was gone for so long after she gave us our appetizers & we needed refills. We had to go to the bar for a refill. The supervisor was shocked that we got up to get our own beverages.

name: Tommye Cauthen
text: Excellent food somehow getting our menus. The manager was very curious and helpful. The seared tuna was fantastic

name: LaTonya Garrett
text: Food was great. Dessert was delicious.  Customer service was excellent as well. Family friendly or can go and hang out and watch sports.

name: Sandra Nunya
text: Food was good, service was amazing. This was a whole package of a great lunch with mother, daughter and two granddaughters. Vegan selections are amazing. Very child friendly.

name: Brianna Valerius
text: Server was okay. My husbands soup came out lukewarm with his dinner. My soup was 15-20 minutes after my dinner came out. Their bison burger (which I take leave to doubt is actual bison having had it in many occasions and if it is, then it has at some time been frozen and the flavor is subpar) was 1/2 inch smaller than the bun all around so for the first 2-3 bites in all directions it was just bread. They put two skinny / skimpy onions on my burger and the singular piece of lettuce was wilted. My server did remedy the situation for us. The bartender gave my husband sass with an eye roll when he asked for a Manhattan which was served in a martini glass? While the choice of glass is odd, that isn’t a big deal, forgetting the bitters is though. My husband did enjoy his $27 steak, it was well cooked and large. Overall this place was a bit of a let down. We were disappointed with the food, timing of the food, and attitude of the bartender. Not a terrible place by any means, but there are just so many better options and ways to spend your money.

name: Kim Gebauer
text: I ordered the classic pizza, had it delivered.   It was rock hard, cold, completely overcooked.  There was almost no sauce and very little cheese. Too many herbs as well. It was literally the worst pizza I’ve ever had. Ive had other food there that was good so this was very disappointing

name: Janna Rolfe
text: We had a great lunch here.  Their berry cider was fabulous.  We also enjoyed our appetizer and meals.  The cheese curbs were delicious and were as good as ones in Wisconsin.  The chicken sandwich and bison burger and salad were all delicious.  The service was great and place felt clean and safe

name: Starrdom100 Radio
text: This has become a new favorite spot! My favorite happens to be the wings with the Root Beer sauce!!! I also love the fried Wisconsin cheese curds!

name: Andy Huber
text: I've been here twice now and had a good experience both times. Once at lunch with good food suggestions from the waitress and once at the end of my day for drinks. The waiter let me sample a few flavors of their house beer and was  regularly making sure nothing else was needed. Fair price, good food, good drinks!

name: Katlyn Campbell
text: Absolutely at a loss for words at how amazing this establishment is. The atmosphere, the employees, the wait time, THE FOOD!! Would definitely without any hesitation recommend this place to anyone looking for an excellent dining experience.

name: Kristin Fountain
text: First time trying BJ's and it's the first time, in a long time, I have been impressed with a restaurant in Mobile. Everything was so delicious and flavorful and the family meal was so convenient. Finally,  a restaurant actually worth going to. We will be back soon!

name: Cory Sprouse
text: Ordered the Brussel sprouts and kale salad for pick up. Got it home, no Brussel sprouts.  I thought ok, not a problem since I ordered avocado on the side. When I opened up the container for the avocado there was not even a quarter of an avocado cut up in the container. Not worth it and the most disappointing experience and a waste of money.

name: Nina Grandison
text: My experience was not great went on a Sunday ordered a pork chop was told my companion ordered the last one. Later waitress come back to table and companion was told there wasn't any pork chops left. Another companion ordered an appetizer and salad they didn't receive it till after their  entree after informing the waitress. Refills filled only after informing waitress they were needed. Not a busy day but service was awful.

name: Bryan Holder
text: Menu is quite large and diverse. Prices are what I consider too expensive for what you get. They would do better reducing their menus size and focusing to keep dishes.

name: neal moore
text:
The food was good and at first the service was good as well. Between my entree my drinks and my dessert me a solo diner spent $50 in tipped 20% accordingly.

I signed my checks before I had finished my dessert and had hoped on another glass of water before I left. I ended up sitting and waiting 10 or 15 minutes looking around for a server just to get another glass of water before I left. My server was unfindable.  Funny enough their table would have been cleared in probably three or four minutes as the only reason I was staying was I wanted another glass of water and had planned on drinking it and then leaving.

Probably not going to stop back in when I come back.

name: Pat Richard
text: The food was good.  Our waiter was delightful.  Nice and clean restaurant.

name: Jade
text: I got the baked ziti and ordered a side Cesar salad, both were good. Social distancing was in place very well, even though we were a party of 9 we were separated in the same section. The menu was online and had to be scanned by QR code to get to it. Our server was great , and checked in frequently while trying to check all her other tables and kept our drinks filled. Overall it was a nice experience given the circumstances.

name: Jacqueline Trenier
text: Absolutely love this place! I've been coming here with friends for a few years now and the food and customer service are amazing. Shout out to Austin! He's amazing!

name: Tabby Mac4
text: I've tried just about everything on the menu. The food here is really great!

name: Devin Blakely
text: The kitchen at the Mobile, AL location has no pride in presentation or preparation of food. I have patronized this location over the years and I have had the same mediocre food each time so common sense would say stop spending my money there. So this will be the last time. Several items we ordered came out cold, over cooked or horribly presented which made you not even want to eat it. Management did nothing but gave excuses on top of lazy apologies for the few times he himself had to come back to bring us food that was prepared wrong. Money was not an issue but being in management myself there would have been no way I would have made a customer pay for ANY of the horrible food that came out of that kitchen. This has to be Bj's standard because there is no way over the years that I can receive the same mediocre service and bad food EVERY TIME I come. The kitchen manager and GM should be ashamed. And if you thought the customer service that you provided was acceptable you were mistaken.

name: Josue Roman
text: Ask for Ashley, extraordinary service!  Thank you!  The best service you can have.  As for the food, super delicious.  You must try the spaghetti and meatballs;  I loved!  It is the first time that I go and I really liked the place.  Super clean and clean bathrooms.  If you have not gone this is a place which you should not stop going and more if you like to spend it with your family.  A cozy place, an extensive bar and the perfect music.  What did I not like?  that I left on the table the food I had to take home 😭😭😭Lol.

name: Sam morris
text: BJ's was wonderful... I've never been to a restaurant that had such great service so quickly. Cybreena was especially wonderful behind the bar.  thank you so much. Keep up the good work. The other restaurants in the Mobile area should come and observe your service and they could learn a lot

name: Leigh Davis
text: Great food, atmosphere,  and great service. Bartender was phenomenal. Highly recommend.

name: David Seward
text: Great service, great beer,  great food, just a bit pricey

name: Stacey Steiner
text: Didn't go there. Was next door at Jason's Deli. It was fantastic. They have reopened their salad bar which is the best salad bar I have ever seen and it was great.

name: Morgan Black
text: Pretty good place. Food is good, and it has a comfortable atmosphere.  The wait staff is always been quick and friendly.  If you haven't tried the salted caramel cookie thing you are missing out!

name: Robert Helvey
text: I went there to get something to eat. The hostess said  I could sit anywhere in the bar area, since it was only me. I sat at a table, since that was the only space available. The manager came over and told me I had to leave that that table was reserved for guest seated by the hostess. I told him the hostesses said to sit there and he told me I couldn’t. He was very rude about it so I left. I didn’t even get a chance to order anything, I can’t review the food but the manager was rude.

resp.text:
Robert,

I wanted to apologize for the miscommunication that was had at our restaurant this past Friday evening. I wanted to clarify that you were not asked to leave, but were asked to move to the actual bar or if you would have liked, we could have sat you in the dining room. Again, I apologize for the miscommunication. Furthermore, we will be working with our team to ensure all guests are sat in a timely manner and that we are clear with our guests on how our bar/cocktail seating works. Please reach out to me with any questions at dearnest@bjsrestaurants.com.

Sincerely,

David Earnest
General Manager

name: William Bradley
text: Great pizza and huge beer selection. Monday night is half off their pizzas. Our server, Christopher, was outstanding.

name: C C
text: All about the Tri-tip Nachos! Loaded up and delicious 🤤. Friendly staff and knowledgeable about the big menu.

name: Halie White
text: Best food I've had in a long time must try the mango porkchops so delicious

name: robert stechyn
text: Very nice atmosphere, Bartender very ambitious as well the food was great.

name: Hannah Chapman
text: About two days ago I got the worst food poisoning I have ever had from eating about half of a side salad. I am still ill and haven't been able to eat. I'm just blown away that not even half of a SIDE salad did this. I hope they start taking better precautions.

name: Steven S
text: Keep in mind we came in 15 minutes before the kitchen was closing. But food should be just as good at the end of the night as it is at the beginning. Ribeye was awesome.  Cooked perfectly.  Fish and chips was cooked in old grease. But fish still had decent crisp and flavor. Enlightened Asian chicken was decent. Chicken was tender. Roasted Brussels were tough and not so flavorful. The atmosphere and cleanliness was awesome.  We will be back , just maybe earlier in the evening. Will definitely try some of the craft beers next time.

name: Scott Woodcock
text: Cleaned our own table and sat for 20 mins without drinks at 4pm on March 9th 2021. Watched our waiter sit and chat with friends until we decided to find a more attentive place to eat.

name: Pamela The Islandgirl
text: Wow! What a tasty meal we had. Price was a good value..and we loved, just loved taking home an extra meal for just $6.00. We shared an appetizer, had 2 entrees, a lovely yummy salad and dessert plus took 2 meals home for much less than usual. Can highly recommend- service was attentive and ambiance really cool! Will return for sure!!

name: Michelle Crenshaw
text: Jocelyn was very helpful and if you get a chance to sit in her section you should. The beer was good and the food was fantastic. I had tri-tip power bowl, so good. Will be going back.

name: George Spragg
text: Best prime rib I have ever had. Make sure and have the brownie pizookie.

name: CHARLES TAYLOR
text: Came in at 2 PM.  Taken to a booth.  No one waited on us.  Other customers who were seated after us were waited on.  Waiter and hostess saw us but ignored us.  After 15 minutes we left.

name: Michael Strayer
text:
It's a national chain, but this was my first time eating here. So a review.

Tonight was only the second official day the place has been open. Lots of friendly staff and trainers. Great open restaurant with nice bar and tons of craft beer on tap. Enormous menu. Plenty of tv's to watch a game.

Told the bartender I liked amber lager beer, so she brought me the house amber. Really nice beer with great flavor.

Ordered some wings with extra hot buffalo sauce and ranch dressing. Very tasty, sauce was hot but not too hot.

Overall, if I wanted some bar food or even some pizza or pasta...I would not hesitate to come back. Great place.

name: Jamie Jackson
text: BJs is great. The food is great, they have tons of beer on tap, and Caroline behind the bar is awesome. We went twice in one week. Great food, great customer service. We will definitely be back.

name: Rhonda Guitroz
text: The service was slow eventhoug the restaurant was empty, and the waitress couldn't seem to get the order right.

name: Tamara Berry
text: Very tasty Entrées. Our server, Stormy Lee, for a party of 9 & a toddler makes 10 was excellent to say the least!

name: Samantha Roberson
text: Both the tri tip and ribeye we ordered were severely overcooked. The chicken looked and tasted like it came out of the microwave. The cauliflower was undercooked to the point it was almost raw and tasted awful on top of that. The asparagus and the ribeye were so spicy it was inedible even if it was cooked correctly. The only reason it's getting two stars is because our waiter was exceptionally amazing and took care of us so well.

name: Parth Patel
text: Very nice restaurant from inside. The interior is very well maintained. They have a bar which looks really cool compared to other restaurants I go to. The service they gave was real nice and the food served was fast. The food was not great, not that it was bad. The food was decent, could be better.

name: Catrina Stevenson
text: Can I just say Amazing!!! The food selection is huge. So it's great for several people to go because there is something for everyone. The Brew list is fantastic!! Lots and lots of options. The staff are very attentive and friendly!! The birthday cookie is so delicious!!

name: P. T.
text: This restaraunt was one ok. However, I have left the last three times because the hostess makes me feel like I have been discriminated against. Today I was told the wait would be 35 to 45 minutes but there were vacant tables everywhere. We left and drove to another similar restaraunt who actually had more tables filled and were seated right away.

resp.text:
P.T.,

I want to apologize for not having seated you right away. Discrimination by any means will not be tolerated. Please reach out to me at dearnest@bjsrestaurants.com so I can get some more information regarding this incident. We would like to rectify the situation and ensure you and your guests can enjoy our restaurant at any time.

Sincerely,

David Earnest
General Manager

name: Tisha Doakes
text: Food was good I tried something different, healthy. it was a good choice very satisfied 😋 Nice atmosphere

name: Chip Hearn
text: We had a party of 4.  We all enjoyed our meal!  Would eat there again if we ever stop in Mobile again!

name: G L
text:
Sitting at a table I intensely dislike. Supposedly the only one available, even so many more people were seated right after us.
Chicken Pot Stickers cold, tough and tasteless.
Spicy Chicken with Soba Noodles,  greasy and luke warm, drowned in peanut sauce.  BRUSSELS Sprouts cold, looking like dried grass, fried, no seasoning. No Sriracha Crema. My husband enjoyed his hamburger. Beside that,  Worst meal we had here.
Our Waitress, Sabre, was friendly and attentive. The Manager waved at us once. Tried to get his attention to tell him above. However, whenever he passed, he ignored us. We did not want anything comped. Just giving feedback. I was a professional Chef, now retired. We should have left before being seated close to the entrance at a corner where everyone swept past. It will not happen again. We usually stop at BJ's whenever we have to go to Mobile. We will wait a while before we return.

resp.text:
Mrs. Landau,

This is concerning and we want to make this right. I would like to apologize for the experience yesterday and for not being the one to come over and ensure everything was up to par. Obviously, this was not the case. There is no excuse for being seated a table you intensley disliked. Also, there is no reason why the food should have been tasteless or overdone.  Please contact me via email at dearnest@bjsrestaurants.com so I can get some more information from you so that we can better coach our team to ensure a better dining experience. You can also reach out to me at the restaurant 251-581-9240. Thank you for your feedback and I look forward to speaking with you soon.

Sincerely,

David Earnest
General Manager

name: charles anderson
text: First and last time coming here. Lost my business over this covid b.s. If they were worried about masks, they should have stayed closed! Air conditioning circulates air so what is the point of wearing a mask to walk around just to take it off to eat? That is kinda stupid if you ask me. Never heard of some silly stuff like this.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Dining companion noted how long it took the waitress to arrive after a hassle about an appropriate seating place. Love the roasted brussel sprouts and the art. Kinda overpriced for what you get. VERY salty. Hostess needs more training, to allow customers in wheelchairs to sit where they need to sit. Many of the square tables have a large chunky round center pedestal, which disallow getting under the table very far, and when I pointed this out, she did not seem too concerned, so I had to ask for another table and I remembered being seated at a certain table previously. I mentioned that. She was reluctant. I nudged. We went in that direction and I pointed out the ideal table. She offered a booth with a post at the end and I pointed out the problem, and declined. I again pointed to the table that would work, and she said that section has been cleaned and I said I see that, but...Would you like me to clear it with a manager? So she offered the table beside it, same section, because it was smaller, for our party of two. The larger table did not have a center round pedestal. I gave in, because by this time it was feeling like an argument, making my dining companion uncomfortable, and the table offered was better than the first of the three. See photos for specifics on food and space. Atmosphere gets 5 stars.

name: Ahmed Nasser
text: Took an hour and half to 5 pazookies, wasn’t even busy. And then they only gave me 4. Come here if you like being treated as a nuisance. Also the pazookie could have been have been sold as a cracker and no one would have noticed.

name: Rhiannon Sweatt
text: It was fantastic and the bartender Joel was excellent and attentive to us and the other customers around us!

name: Jennifer Davis
text: I just went to met my boyfriend who is a UPS driver, working until 10:30-11 every night for dinner and they refused to seat me until he was there. I explained to them that he only has a hour for his “lunch” and I wanted to get a table and place his drink order before he got there and they told me I wasn’t allowed to have a table until he arrived. I was beyond disappointed to see the kind of customer service they showed THEIR own UPS driver during the holidays. Unlike them, he doesn’t get to clock out at 9 pm and go home to his family!  Horrible experience and we will not be back!  BTW.. they’re were only 4-5 tables in the bar area being used!  They obviously need the business and yet turned us away!

resp.text:
Jennifer,

I wanted to apologize for the terrible experience you had with us yesterday. There is absolutely no excuse on why we wouldn't be able to seat you so you could wait for your boyfriend to join you. I'm extremely sorry that this happened and would love to talk with you and make it right. Please reach out to me at dearnest@bjsrestaurants.com or call me at the restaurant at 251-581-9240. I will be speaking with all of our hosts today to ensure they know how to properly seat our guests. Please reach out to me at your convenience. I look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,

David Earnest
General Manager
BJ's Mobile, AL

name: Marshall OHern
text: Good food and service.  A large selection of menu items.

name: AL Jefferson
text: Food is always amazing. However, your website said half off pizza Monday’s automatically deducts the promo code at checkout. But the price stays the same. Please get this glitch fixed.

name: Aidan Screws
text: Bad service, long wait despite having a reservation, rude manager, and mediocre food. Do not recommend

name: Nedra Irby
text: Wasn't happy with my food .the steak bloody and bake potato was cool.shrimps was cooked all the way.

name: Paul LePiane
text: Everything was good our server was very nice and attentive.

name: Juan Hernandez
text: Brisket bacon burger is very delicious paired with their own tasty IPA... perfect!!

name: Jasmine Grim
text: Nice atmosphere, and my waitress Missy was lovely, attentive and quick.  I ordered the blood orange pom sangria, was very delicious but heads up it has a very strong cinnamon flavor. The fried artichoke hearts were delicious, the batter was perfect and they were juicy. Lastly I got the enlightened Pacific poke with buckwheat noodles, the flavors were great, you could taste the wasabi but it was not overpowering, my only critique is I wish the buckwheat noodles were a little chewy as they are traditionally served, but still very much enjoyed the dish.

name: Marg Fields
text:
We had an office holiday lunch here Tuesday. The food was amazing! Service was phenomenal! Two waitresses took care of 40+ individuals with excellence 👍🏼😊

I can’t wait for our next trip here!  Love this restaurant 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼😊

name: Terry Covas
text: My family and I had a terrible experience with this particular location. We were seated immediately after entering the restaurant. We waited twenty minutes for someone to take our drink order(at this point we should have left). Drinks arrived quickly. We placed our food order and waited thirty five minutes for, a burger, two fish tacos, mini corn dogs, chicken Alfredo and chicken tenders. When the food arrived they forgot to cook the tenders. So as I sat patiently across from my daughter who had not received her food I realized that everyone's beverages were empty, we never receiveda refill until the tenders arrived. We finally received ALL our food 46 min after placing our order. Food was not that great. All this would have been understandable if they were busy, but the place was practically empty. We will not be dinning at this location again.

name: Justin Kline
text:
Food is ok but they do have a big selection, which is nice. Pizzas are the best thing on the menu besides the Avocado Egg Rolls. They do have really solid drinks so I would choose this place for drinks first.

The Mobile Pay/Menu, option is very convenient. Get the app, it's definitely worth it if you plan to come regularly.

name: Terry Collette
text: This is in the Old Cheddars building. 100% improvement. Very nice open dining area. Menu was huge. Food was particularly good. Great addition to the area.

name: Sedra D
text: The gluten free pepperoni extreme was good

name: jan vickers
text: BJ'S is great! The food is awesome and our waitress was so sweet! Wasn't really thrilled with needing to scan the table to see the menu,  but I'm old school and like to see it on paper 👍

name: rjacpapbcrun
text: Ask for Joel. One of the best yet

name: Shelley Griffin
text: Our food was very good. The waiter was fabulous.

name: Aisha Lyle
text: The service at this place is always wishy washy and lately it’s just been horrible. I called to place a to-go order and someone told me the kitchen closed at 10:30, which is crazy because i’ve ordered later than that. My friend called two seconds later and another lady took our order no problem. The food is good but some of their employees are questionable.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about the service issue. I am so sorry about this! We would love to connect with you. Please give us a call at the restaurant so we can make this right for you and learn more.

name: Logan Smith
text: This is a unique bar and grill they serve everything you desire, from salad to Wong's to burgers. They will satisfy every taste bud in your mouth. Once you take on Vite of their tasty food you'll never want to leave. My personal favorite from Bj's is the Parmesan garlic boneless wings. Come to Bj's you won't regret it.

name: Amber Pond
text: Food and beers were both great. Well prepared. The ribs were tneder, steak was cooked to order correctly, and all veggies were fresh. ill go back.

name: makenzie mh
text: The atmosphere is very nice and it seems very elegant but that's about where it stops. Our waitress was annoyed and got attitude when we asked for a refill or salt and pepper, not to mention when we needed to go boxes. The food was over priced. For example their chicken alfredo is very bland and honestly you can make the same at home but are charging like $15 for it. While it is a big portion it didn't taste good. Our silverware wasn't clean as well. While there are always spots that you just can't get off, there was actual left over food on the forks...

name: Tim Simmons
text: Great food, kinda expensive but was a good experience.

name: Seth Shipley
text:
Rough meal, I would recommend looking for other options.  Out of deep dish large pizzas (Monday’s 1/2 off special) well before closing (though offered half off a small after I inquired).  Small deep dish pizza came out with soggy, spongy crust and lukewarm (as the last item delivered).  Ribs had good flavor, but also lukewarm with a baked potato seriously undercooked.  Tortilla soup came out closer to gelatin than soup (barely warm), though I appreciated that our waitress took the soup off our bill based on our feedback.

Staff was cordial, but perfunctory.  Didn’t want to seat us at booth due to a “rotation”, and it makes me wonder if our food quality suffered because we were “difficult” in our seating request.  Hope this was just an off night, but after multiple poor BJs Restaurant experiences, I’ll be steering clear for the foreseeable future.

name: Jerri Ledford
text: Bj's has great craft beer (most of the time)! But if you're expecting consistent food preparation, this may not be the right place. I ordered a steak, medium rare. It came out medium and the salad came out after the meal. Of course, the pizookies are always spot on and if you want fast seating, you can always go to the bar.

name: Andrew Christensen
text: Great food (overpriced), solid beer, decent atmosphere, but shoddy service. Mandy seemed pleasant but didn’t seem to know her stuff very well. Later on, we were clearly done eating but she ignored us for a solid 30 minutes. She claimed we were watching the football game and didn’t want to disturb us. We were only watching because we were bored waiting on her to bring us the check.

name: JO
text: They have a wide array of items on the menu. It's good food.

name: Ashley Hitt
text: I got made like I wasn't a inconvenience due to my size.

name: Charles Jones
text: Great service, tasty food. Ashley at the bar went above and beyond on a Thursday night.

name: Ricardo Coleman
text: Great service and great food, I will be coming back

name: Nathan Brown
text: Beers were great, food was cooked perfectly and very delicious. Our server Haley was great and after having some battery troubles in the parking lot, Lambert came and assisted. Super kind people at this place.

name: Jason Holton
text: Was recommended by family and visited today. Was definitely disappointed with the food and service. $26 ribeye no taste, was not even offered steak sauce, which in this case it needed. Steak like this should have a WOW about it but not there. Baked potato no butter, sour cream, salt or pepper. Salad just plain with maybe a teaspoon of dressing. No rolls, bread or crackers. Had sweet tea not offered a refill. Never asked how is your meal taste or prepared. Have had better food and service at fast food for a third of the price. Disappointing

name: Aaron Moore
text: The food is amazing and the services was spot on!

name: Rodney Moody
text: Busy but good. A little loud but it's just part of the scene. Get over it. I will be back.

name: Lesley Gunn
text: Waitress wasn't on her job too slow and food was nasty...

name: David Martinez
text: Food was great but service from bartender was poor. He said he "wants to go home" so we have to leave.

resp.text: Oh no! I am so sorry! This is not what we want to hear. We would love to connect with you. Please give us a call at the restaurant so we can make it right.

name: Lady V0516
text: Food was good.   Service was excellent.   Restaurant is making sure to keep to social distancing standards and servers are wearing masks.

name: TC Gurus
text: Great selection of craft beers. Pizza was surprisingly good... very good in fact. I like the atmosphere. Great happy hour specials.

name: Josephine Maddox
text: Every thing was unacceptable my family an I will not return ever

name: Summer King
text: Seriously delicious fries! Great burgers. Tasty apps, with a wide variety beyond the usual. Really really good! We'll be back Monday night for their pizza Special!

name: Tys Greene
text: Awesome place to eat. Mandy, our waitress, took excellent care of us. (Thank you, Mandy)Sampled 4 different beers, to start off. Ordered their homemade guacamole, with homemade desserts chips. AWESOME!!! Hubby ordered full strip spare ribs, with a bowl of chili and mashed potatoes. I had the mahi-mahi, fish tacos. Very good!!! All in all, very satisfied and happy

name: Jim Habeck
text: Food not cooked to request.  Manager failed to maintain social distancing.

name: David Lee
text: The bbq brisket burger was one of the best burgers I've ever had. But the sweet tea didn't have enough sugar in it. Nothing ruins a meal for me more than sugarless "sweet tea". It's like drinking brown water, and paying three bucks for it. It's down right insulting! This is the south, put more sugar in that tea!!

name: Brian McDonald
text: Had the Dark Side Flight beer assortment... Red & Brunette is always my favorite!! Lemon Tyme Chicken was phenomenal!!! Chicken was so tender it is as if it were rotisserie!! Also took the Monkey Bread Poozokie to-go... Had it in the past and was REALLY good!!

name: Summer King
text: Seriously delicious fries! Great burgers. Tasty apps, with a wide variety beyond the usual. Really really good! We'll be back Monday night for their pizza Special!

name: Josephine Maddox
text: Every thing was unacceptable my family an I will not return ever

name: Lesley Gunn
text: Waitress wasn't on her job too slow and food was nasty...

name: David Lee
text: The bbq brisket burger was one of the best burgers I've ever had. But the sweet tea didn't have enough sugar in it. Nothing ruins a meal for me more than sugarless "sweet tea". It's like drinking brown water, and paying three bucks for it. It's down right insulting! This is the south, put more sugar in that tea!!

name: Jim Habeck
text: Food not cooked to request.  Manager failed to maintain social distancing.

name: William Tackett
text: Mediocre food, burgers not hot. Asparagus tough, undercooked. Prices way too high! Will not go back.

name: Billy Shook
text: The food was sub par and overpriced. Wouldn't go back or recommend.

name: Crystal Reynolds
text: Even after a month I'm still thinking about how good the chicken and brussel sprouts was even at 12 at night it was awesome this was during Mardi Gras and there was literally nothing else good open and I happened upon this place I've never heard of amazing and everyone was super nice even though it was really and they were about to close within the hour.

name: Jamal Jamal
text: This is not a deep dish pizza. I love Chicago style pizzas and this was more Pizza Hut. They charge $ 30 for this pizza which is the going rate for a Chicago style pizza but this wasn't it. Pizza was good but not what I expected and definitely over priced. The picture on their menu with the pizza in the deep dish pan is very misleading.

name: Mike Cooney
text: It's funny how they make you wear mask to walk in but employees can't even wear them correctly or at all so what is the point

name: LaKesha Fagan
text: Tchlinda was a great and informative server. Loved her suggestions and my pizookie!

name: Courtney
text: At first glance it looks like the regular old BJ's restaurant and brewery that you would typically go to except for there are some changes due to Covid 19 which is understandable. I looked up and I saw a sign that said to go orders, I said hey I'll try that for my lunch tomorrow. So I ordered this to go pasta and when I raised the lid it smelled like putrid rotten vegetables thrown into a plastic box to the extent that it made me want to vomit immediately. I hope no one ever has this terrible experience I had and maybe they need to check the to-go boxes before handing them out to people, I was highly disappointed and I will not be getting anything from there again.

name: Nathan Jones
text: The Jambalaya made me sick, some of the contents was not fresh. I went there on 9/9 for dinner, now I have to eat soft foods until my stomach recovers.

name: Millie Hartzog
text:
First this is the first time I have ever written a review but felt it necessary.
The restaurant had an association meeting with a large group of people and instead of being prepared with enough staff to cover the large group....it was not.  First problem-we were trying to get a table to seat 8 people for a birthday celebration.  Manager at one point told me to "go figure out what you want and let me know"... After figuring out a place to sit we then have to deal with a bad first waiter.  Our "1st" waiter left our table without saying a word to us 3 times to answer questions such as (1) can happy hour prices be given to us since we did not sit in the bar area; (2) if the restaurant carried Flat Tire beer; (Excuse me but isn't this restaurant a brewhouse?); and (3)  does the restaurant have diet tonic, diet sprite or any diet drinks.  At one point the waiter told our table that he had just had a long day and was tired.  So, he complained to the manager about us and we were given another waitress.  She (Kayla B.) was great.  At one point since there was only 1 bartender on duty (really when you know you have a group of 50 to 75 women maybe more bartenders would be a good idea!) she ended up preparing our cocktails.  One person in our group ordered double meat pizzas to take home to her family.  She had to send the pizzas back because there was no meat on them!!  We arrived at 5:30 p.m. and did not receive our water and/or drinks until 6:15!

name: Elisjsha Sexton
text: I didnt even get seated, I was told 20min wait, and then another 30min, and then another 20min. I was looking forward to trying it for the first time but after seeing 3 couples leave that arrived after me, im not going back

name: Vera Ringold
text: The food was delicious and the service was great. Considering the social distancing everything was perfect. We will definitely be back.

name: Emily S
text: Love this place! Visited multiple times with the same, great service every time. Food is great! Portions are big, so expect to take some home. They offer free dessert if you download their app!

name: Michael Ellis
text: Awesome as always would give 10 stars if I could.

name: pinkesh mistry
text:
Server (Ashley) was friendly, helped me put my custom pita taco order together.
Liked the food and place.

name: Megan Bolton
text: I love the food. The whole family enjoyed it. Cant wait to try their brews.

name: Kim Kraner
text: DINING ROOM NOW OPEN in big bold letters on the sign draping the door...4:20 pm on a Tue afternoon...5 cars in the lot and approximately 10-15 total guests...walked in only to be told it would be a 20 min WAIT?!  More staff needed for SURE! :(

name: Donna Marie
text: The food is okay. The price's where a little high for what you get. The staff seemed like they had no energy at all. The place is very clean and nice looking though. I just won't be back, I've had much better food at much more affordable prices.

name: Kimberly Lombardi
text: Great menu. Good food awesome Service.

name: Markell Johnson
text: Very disappointed. The food has been very bland lately and every time I order a pizookie with CHOCOLATE ice cream I receive vanilla ice cream. It doesn’t matter which app I order it in. You guys have lost a customer and it’s a shame because the pizookies are good but you can’t even include the correct ice cream flavor.

name: Laverne Robinson
text: I had a good time I will be back

name: Neda Brewton
text: First time we've been here and we loved it. Missy was our waitress and was great. The food was really good. Restaurant was clean but needed to be dusted around the booths. A little dust will not keep us from coming back.

name: Eric Green
text: So many choices so little time. I just loved their lemon thyme chicken

name: Cynthia Young
text: The food was delicious, the restaurant could have been cleaner, dusty, finger prints on the windows, table sticky.

name: Bea Bowers
text: Ribeye was delicious, service was poor. Person seating us was unprepared and separated 2 tables for us to sit. We weren't asked table or booth. We waited a long time for water and soda.  I had to get up to ask for napkins. Salads came out and we had to wait for silverware. There was no salt or pepper on table.  My husband's dirty (salad) dish remained on table throughout meal. Garlic butter was not fully melted. Beer was cool, not cold. We were very disappointed.

name: Jessica Stuck
text: If I could leave no stars I would for the horrible service from the hostess and staff! They only had 5 tables with people in the whole empty restaurant but when they sat us and we clearly had 5 people they tried to put us at a 4 person table and when I told them we had 5 they said that we'd have to wait longer. There were several booths and tables that were far away from the other diners more than 6ft away but they said those were closed. They even tried to tell us to stand outside even though my parents could not stand outside in the heat to wait for another table! They were very rude about it as well even though we were more than 6ft from the hostess. We just left after that and will not be back.

name: Darlene Daffin
text: Had dinner there last evening...good food, great service.  Went back this afternoon for drinks; sat in booth in bar area for over 10 min. and NO ONE came for our order.  Heard discussion among servers that we were there for drinks only!  NOT family friendly as advertised!!!

name: Tonnetta Esprit
text: Omg, James the waiter was sooooo amazing and professional. Food and drinks was good too.

name: bordurlin
text: This restaurant has one of the most diverse menus I've ever seen in a restaurant.  Also, it has a very LARGE selection of dishes.  Everything I've ever eaten here was very good.  I think the prices are a little high, but the service has always been very good, and the food is, too.  So, I'll keep going back.  I still can't believe how good the menu is...

name: Crystal Reynolds
text: Even after a month I'm still thinking about how good the chicken and brussel sprouts was even at 12 at night it was awesome this was during Mardi Gras and there was literally nothing else good open and I happened upon this place I've never heard of amazing and everyone was super nice even though it was really and they were about to close within the hour.

name: Alexia Whalen
text: STOP PUTTING BROCOLLI ON THE FETTECINI. Everyone takes it off anyways, no one thinks that’s good. Thank you!

name: Anthony Welborn
text: The food was very good but the wait for a table was annoying with so many empty tables everywhere.

name: Dee Burdette
text: Fish and chips were very good. Alexis was excellent

name: Ralph Lindsey
text: Excellent, BJs favorite pizza was to for.....and Mandy was our server👍 who has a great personality and very accommodating.

name: Brittany Ulmer
text: I read about this place online. The reviews I saw were raving and everyone seemed to be excited. For every bad review/ opinion I saw there were 15 great ones. I was in the area of the restaurant  and finally decided to come and try it out. I came in the middle of a lunch rush purposely on a Friday to see how my experience would be. I was not disappointed!! The door was great and the service was even better. The menu is diverse and there is literally something for everyone. I have been back on multiple occasions and I have not been let down. I use the app for take out and I have yet to be left unsatisfied. BJ's is a family friendly environment and I highly recommend it!

name: Scott Gordy
text: Very good variety. Nice, cozy atmosphere with a sports backdrop. The in-house beers are very good, but the Porter is among the best I have had.

name: Erik Johansen
text: Bunless burgers should be served on a plate, not on paper.

name: Vicki Radavich
text: Waitstaff knows their brews!

name: tony guin
text: The food was good and the service but they entire menu is unmistakably way over priced.   I ordered the classic prime rib dip sandwich. The photo shows this very nice sandwich on a medium size French  Bread,  a nice pile of  beautiful med cooked shaved prime rib,  which is the true way of doing prime rib.  All for the price of $15.50. Almost the price of a prime rib steak. When the sandwiches showed up I was very disappointed for that price. The bun  was small and narrow what you would like a  jumbo hot dog for.  Maybe a half pound I guess it was prime rib could just be roast beef but fully cooked. nowhere near worth that price.  It was like I went to buy a Cadillac and got a Pinto at a Cadillac price. And even if the food is good I won't go back for over price food.

name: Dorris Thomas
text: Food and service were excellent

name: Rashida
text: I recently visited with a coworker, but today I brought my family for their first visit. From the first greeting, everything was incredible!! All of the staff worked as a team & seemed happy to be there. You can tell they take pride in cleanliness, too! Very nicely decorated, food was impeccable, and lastly (but definitely not least), my waitress (Darnisha) was AMAZING!! She was very knowledgeable of the menu items, friendly, precise...I can go on & on. The only complaint is BJ's didn't come to Mobile sooner than they did. Thank you all so much!!!

name: Zack Davis
text: This is a pretty good lunch spot. The piadinis are really tasty and the fries are great. The beer selection is also really good even if the Bj's brand brews are mediocre at best. The only two criticisms I have are that 1. This place is mad corporate. There's none of that culture that you feel in the local places that these restaurants are trying to emulate. And 2. Food is a little over priced. You can get it cheaper and better at the local restaurants this place so desperately wants to feel like.

name: Curt Crider
text: BJ's has a nice bar atmosphere, even in the dining area. High ceilings, overstuffed booths,  nice woody interior. The menu is wide and varied. If you can't find something to eat then you are not hungry. The bar menu with all of its beers and wines and cocktails is likely to have your favorite as well as having something you should try. Catch the Happy Hour menu to make a really affordable evening. I had the veggie burger which I think was a garden burger patty. Very good with the Chipotle mayo and fried jalapenos. I also had the craft root beer and it was very good.

name: Gina Crenshaw
text: Been here twice, service was decent, but the food isn't great, my first visit I had the prime rib sandwich and when it arrived it wasn't very hot and for the price you pay $15, they didn't give you much meat on that very slender hoagie bun, plus it was bland... Even though on my first visit the food wasn't good, I did give them a second try on another visit, I didn't want to completely write them off so quickly since they did have lots of other items to try on their menu, so the second time I ordered the steak (medium well) with a loaded baked potato and broccoli for sides...When it arrived, I immediately felt like for the price you pay $18, the steak could have been a bit bigger, but the kicker was when I cut into it, it was not cooked medium well like I asked, it was well done and very dry and on top of that, the broccoli taste like it had been microwaved and was not seasoned at all or hot, the only thing that was edible was my loaded baked potato...I have to say I probably won't be back again, the service was fine, but the food honestly is not great and overpriced....I tried. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

name: Peggy H
text: Great food and our waitress Sabrina was excellent!! We will definitely be eating here a lot in the future because there are so many things we want to try!!

name: Tyler Boney
text: BJ's is a great place to grab a bite to eat! The pizza and salmon is good! And the pizookies are AMAZING! good service too!

name: Mika Holt
text: Loved it, good variety of food for everyone, friendly staff and decent prices

name: Darlennia Payton
text: The food was good. Friendly server.  The restrooms were very clean.

name: Menchu King
text: Good food.

name: Ethan F.
text: The food isn't fantastic for the price, except for the happy hour, the drinks ain't cheap either. Seating area is reasonably comfortable and cozy.

name: Kris Waters
text: Absolutely loved it

name: Kyra Reid
text: Went on the half off pizza special day, and that pizza was huge! Deep dish, so many toppings, dripping with cheese, the whole deal! (Also, the house made root beer is amazing! Definitely a new favorite!) We'll certainly be back to try out some more menu options!

name: Danny Wolfe
text: Not. Wearing. A. Mask. For. 10. Feet.

name: Morgan Tyrone
text: Good food terrible waitor

name: Erin Kauffman
text: Excellent pizza at a great price! Monday is half off pizza. We had the tomato and basil pizza and added sausage to it. With the chips and fire roasted tomato salsa as a starter. For two, our total was $18! Can't beat that!

name: Ashley Seale
text: So much to choose from! Service can be casually slower but well worth it. Lots of chooses for kids and they bring out a super cute kid appetizer to keep the little ones occupied while waiting for the food to come :)

name: Cary Reams
text: It is EXTREMELY Rare that I write a Negative Review - EXTREMELY, but the service at this BJ’s was pretty bottom of the barrel! As a whole - we love the BJ’s Chain - we have been to many of them across the country, but this one was subpar for sure. And it was just the service or actually COMPLETE LACK OF - there were lots of people working - and the restaurant wasn’t very crowded - but about 90% of the employees here were just standing around in little groups chatting and playing with their cell phones! It was amazing! I think there was only one waitress in the entire restaurant that was working, everyone else was just looking at their phones and no one was getting service! It was terrible! Total lack of anything!!!

name: Matthew McArthur
text: Restaurant looks nice and seems set up ok but the staff are EXTREMELY unpleasant, unfriendly and just made the entire visit where we could not wait to finish the mediocre food and leave.

name: Shauna Calhoun
text: Oh this place was soo good! The service was also really good!

name: D Vincent
text: The menu is over 20 pages long of below average food. I wish they would cut the menu to maybe 5 pages and focus on making good dishes. I tried one of there brewed beer. I do not remember the name of it but it was just a lighter  bluemoon. The only good thing is the cookie

name: Nicole Nassar
text: This place is AWESOME! The menu is extensive. There is something for almost everyone here. Great mixed drinks and beer! The food was delicious! I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great place to eat!

name: Brad Bauer
text: The food here is excellent.  A lot of people eat here.  Not cheap, but quality comes at a price and they make real effort to make it the best it can be.  The bartender did order me one step larger pizza than I clearly specified but I just took the excess home.  Beer, liquor, and food selection is bar none and I know I can go there confidently!  I wouldn't have any doubt about going there again.

name: Bama Girl
text: Always love BJ's! Our waitress was awesome! She was so patient with our questions and very knowledgeable about the menu items and beverages. The food was delicious and beverages were spot on!

name: Angelica Sullivan
text: I ordered takeout from here for my children I haven't dined in, but from my view, this is a great place to sample different loggers. I noticed they have a zucchini noodle dish that looks great and low carb friendly. I got a chance to look at the menu and the food prices are reasonable and the selection is pretty good so go check this out.

name: AP
text: I loved the decor and ambience.  All we ordered was one of the pizookies, but it was so good!  Absolutely to die for.  The menu was huge, which is always a little worrisome, but I'd definitely try some of it.  The burgers looked good.

name: Latesha Johnson
text: If I could rate it at zero I would. After being there and waiting for about an hour, the 4 hamburgers and 1 kids pizza we ordered finally arrived at our table. The waitress told us the wait was because medium well hamburgers take longer to cook and they had to wait on the fresh fries. I've had steaks cooked to medium well that didn't take anywhere near that amount of time, but whatever. The hamburgers were all cold and one of them had mold on the bread. The waitress got the manager who apologized and made numerous excuses, she gave us a new order of boneless wings, but by that time we had been at this restaurant for almost 2 hours after a 6 hour road trip. The calamari we ordered also didn't have any flavor at all. After this disappointing and disgusting experience,the restaurant still handed us a $37.00 bill. We paid the bill and left hungry and feeling sick to our stomach due to the sight of mold on one of the buns. My son and I had taken a few bits out of our hamburgers, so hopefully we didn't unknowingly eat any moldy bread. Our experience at this restaurant was horrible and we will never go back there.

name: DAVID ROGERS
text: I had my first BJ'S this afternoon. Not pleased or impressed at all.  plates were ordered at my table, 2 burgers and a pasta, The burgers were ordered medium, but delivered well done. the bacon cheeseburger was not enjoyed. The Brisket loaded burger I recieved, had a cup full of BBQ with no Brisket. Now to the pasta, the person who eats anything, anywhere we go without complaint, had multiple negative comments. I have three to go boxes in my fridge or do you call those "Doggie Boxes"? Last, I did not order a specialty beer, but my domestic bottled beer was room temperature. Service was brought and asked twice by three different waitresses. Heard great things but tonight was a true disapointment.

name: Judith Reaves
text: Good variety of food choices. Had fun with 'flight' of beer, great way to sample!

name: Maurice Hall
text: It was so wonderful

name: Glenn Andrews
text: Great beer and food selection.  Reasonable prices. Nice atmosphere. Great service.

name: Christy Grant- Goens
text: Really good food and service! 10 out of 10, would definitely eat here again!

name: Carol Hunt
text: Service was good. Food was good. Beer was good. One issue in food delivery wrong meal served by a runner.

name: Emma Peace
text: Great selection of craft beer and menu items. A great place to go for huge variety that will please everyone in the family.

name: Melissa Strickland
text: Oh my goodness! This salad was delicious. This is the Roasted Brussel Sprout and Kale Salad with blackened Salmon. One of the best salads that I’ve had in a long time. Great thing about BJ’s is the diversity of the menu. No matter your taste or mood you can always find something to tickle your taste buds. Tons of menu options. Staff is always friendly and helpful. I will be ordering this again on my next visit!

name: Chuck Fuller
text: The menu has something for everyone. Seriously, if you can't find it here, you aren't hungry. The food is very good, the service is very good and pricing is also very good! Will visit the one that we have here in South Florida for Sure!

name: L Gunn
text: We were a large group and they made seating accommodations for us quickly.  It just took a really long time to get our food and it did not all come out together. The food was good, but we were there for more than 2-1/2 hours.

name: Christy Grant- Goens
text: Really good food and service! 10 out of 10, would definitely eat here again!

name: Chuck Fuller
text: The menu has something for everyone. Seriously, if you can't find it here, you aren't hungry. The food is very good, the service is very good and pricing is also very good! Will visit the one that we have here in South Florida for Sure!

name: Carmen Wilson
text: We have been here 3 times now. Each visit, we tried something different. Tonight it was the pizza. It was thin cracker type crust. And just enough flavor to leave you wanting more. Could have used a bit more of the  ingrefients. Had there been more staff, so we did not have to wait for service, not had dry glasses, or waited 15 minutes for dessert, it would have gotten a 5 star rating.

name: Ann Mayahi
text: BJs staff in Mobile off of Mobile were amazing! We are long time fans and know the food is always going to be fabulous! And today was no different!  When we got to our car it wouldn't start. Our 15 year old dog was with us and it was a 100 degrees outside. We asked for some water while we waited for AAA. they let us bring our dog into cool down and I was so thankful! They even brought her water@ I tried to give the lady a tip but she wouldn't take it! She was so kind and I so appreciated it! THANK YOU!

name: Maurice Hall
text: It was so wonderful

name: Kimberli Roberts
text: Great selection of foods to choose from both healthy and comfort food. It's nice to find a restaurant that stays open late or you can choose light healthy food. They offer small plates and do a great job preparing proteins. My entire party enjoyed their meals the portions are large and they have great service.

name: Wendall Wells
text: I would post 0 stars if available based upon a very bad experience at this location.

name: Keri M
text: Ate here a few times... always decent service .  Sat with Myles today .  Very funny and knowledgeable.  Had a great personality!  Food was good.

name: Emma Peace
text: Great selection of craft beer and menu items. A great place to go for huge variety that will please everyone in the family.

name: Taylor Livingston
text: We have eaten here several times and each time has been the same thing... Awesome food! Awesome drinks and great service! One of my new favorite restaurants.

name: Chris Search
text: Why would u go here?! Way over priced, terrible service. Go somewhere else

name: William Cunningham
text: Great place wonderful food

name: John Anderson
text: Price was fair and the menu was great. Had a bit of everything to appease anyone. Clean place great food and a friendly staff. Highly recommend it.

name: Michael Sanford
text: Had the deep dish pizza.  Food was good and service was excellent.  I am considered tough of tips sometimes and gave a $20 tip on a $60 bill.  Absolutely loved put waitress.

name: Jennifer Carter
text: Only thing good was the drink and salad, burger sucked.

name: Tink Dillard
text: My waiter,Cornell, was very welcoming & entertaining. I had a small issue with my salad which was fixed quickly. The manager,David, also made sure that we were pleased. I ordered the Parmesan crusted chicken & I must say it was delicious! I received a lot of food for the price. Overall it was a great first experience. I will be back!!!

name: Taylor Livingston
text: We have eaten here several times and each time has been the same thing... Awesome food! Awesome drinks and great service! One of my new favorite restaurants.

name: Scott Bordelon
text: Very, very overpriced! The food was awful! This was my second time eating here. I thought I’d try it again thinking that maybe it was just what I ordered the first time. The second time was just as bad! It was $73 for my wife and me to have dinner. We won’t be back!

name: Patrick Williams
text: Great dining experience! Our server helped with food and beer recommendations. We will definitely be frequenting this restaurant from now on.

name: Katie Corley
text: We thoroughly enjoyed our visit to BJ's Brewhouse. The burgers were great as well as the salads! The staff were very friendly and our server had our order out in perfect time. We had their famous pizooki for dessert which are cookies and ice cream... BEST dessert ever! Definitely a must try when you visit!

name: Sally Land
text: I ordered the slow roasted chicken sandwhich togo which is Literally just Chicken, bacon, mayo, lettuce & tomato. I Asked for no tomato and light mayo. She repeated it back to me,twice. I get home and all that is on my sandwhich is a massive amount of mayo & chicken. Thats it. So I spent $12 on mayo and chicken. Waste of time and money.

name: Joann Brown
text: The place was pretty much empty when we arrived yet the services were so slow. It took forever for us to receive our food. When it finally did arrive it was horrible. My philly cheese steak tasted like the meat was substituted with old roast beef. Horrible experience from start to finish.

name: Terry Raines
text: Loved the pizza. Menu a little too big,but food looks good. A little pricey

name: LeAnn Withers
text: I absolutely LOVED this restraunt!!! This is a new favorite and will be going back for sure!!! I ordered the antipasto and spinach stuffed mushrooms, very happy with my choices! My fiance' ordered the bj hamburger and said it's the best one he's had in a long time! Sydney was our waitress and done a great job too! Oh and we don't drink alcohol either!

name: Charlotte Brown
text: Went the other night with a friend, they were out of a few liquors so I couldn't get the drink I wanted but the service and the food was AWESOME! The server was very knowledgeable of the menu and turned us onto a new drink. We had a blast and will be back soon!!!

name: Edward Schafer
text: Excellent selection of food and draft beer. Service was prompt and professional. If you are looking for good beer, great food, a relaxed atmosphere at a decent price B.J's is the spot.

name: Arlette Lee
text:
was surprised with a good choice of gluten free dishes.
brown rice dishes .
👍good tasting food.

name: Chris Gartman
text: The waitress was very un-attentive drop and go kind of attitude. Forgot our appetizer, I had  to ask another  waitress for my second drink. The spaghetti was okay and the chicken in the pasta was rock hard cooked. Not a very good experience for me!

name: Tracy Nicholas
